name: Robes
description:
A small little top down shooter made in under a week by one person.

Kill enemies, get coins, buy upgrades, repeat.

Known issues:

  • Didn't have time to implement sound :<
  • Might get a bit laggy towards the end, with certain high projectile count builds.
  • Only Keyboard + Mouse.
  • Kinda unbalanced.
  • Linux and Mac versions are untested.

WASD to move.
Mouse to aim.
Left Mouse, Right Mouse, Q and Space - Spells
Alt+Enter toggles  fullscreen.
Drag spells to reorder.
Right-click spells to sell (only in shop).

Feedback welcome!

/Hannes
